CustomField.formula: if( ISBLANK(SmartViscaf__longitude__c) || ISBLANK(SmartViscaf__longitude__c) , image( "/resource/" & $Label.smartviscaf__sb_text_unregisteredicon , $Label.smartviscaf__sb_msg_unregistered ) , HYPERLINK("http://maps.google.co.jp/maps?q=" & text( SmartViscaf__latitude__c ) & "," & text(SmartViscaf__longitude__c) & "&iwloc=A", $Label.smartviscaf__sb_msg_checkamap , "_blank") )
CustomField.label: 登録場所
